TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Be sure to get that lastest version!

Waiter! There's a piano in my soup!
Oops. May have dropped my piano.
Waiter, there's a voyager probe in my soup

It seems to be exploring the outer reaches of your bowl while performing gravity assists with the meatballs...

WAITER! My soup is glued onto the ceiling!

That's how you ordered it, sir.

Waiter, my soup has soup in it!

I probably should have put the soup around your bowl. Sorry, i'm new at this job! 8-]

Waiter, there's miniature unicorns in my soup! :-/

Looks like Murphy's law is true...

Waiter! There is no IVA in my soup!

You'll have to order a 3rd party plugin for that, because there will never be official IVA for this soup.

Waiter, there's a bunch of fish swimming in my soup! >:-[

That's the small fish soup.

Waiter, there's an ice sphere instead of my soup!

Sir, didn't you wanted your soup served to you cold?

WAITER!! Why is there Elsa in my soup? This shouldn't be possible!

Better tell Murphy...

Waiter! There's a Mainsail in my soup, and it is the extra spicy version!

How do you think it gets heated?

Waiter, get out of my soup...

Goddamnit, Jim!

Waiter, there's a waiter who tells me to tell you that a waiter is waiting in my soup !

Tell the waiter to wait for a ladder of waiters waiting to wait on the waiting waiter.

Waiter, there's a file too big to eat in my soup!

Edited November 7, 2014 by Lhathron the Elf

It's a mutant fly! Run! Duck for cover!

WAITER!!! There's a mars rover in my soup. What is it doing here, anyways?

It's refueling from your meatballs for its Duna mission.

Waiter, I didn't order soup... O.O

Too bad.

Waiter there's an inexplicably shiny rock in my soup!

Have fun!

Waiter! There's a Waiter in my soup!

*Gets in soup* Now you have 2 waiters in your soup.

Waiter! There's a document for world domination using Let It Go in my soup!

Let it go into the soup. It'll be unreadable in a few minutes.

Waiter, there's a tree in my soup!

Disable terrain scatters, then!

Waiter, there's a soup exploding in my soup.

Well, that failed.

Waiter! There's an ice geyser from Triton in my soup!

Oh no! The wormhole has appeared!. *Dramatically runs towards the table dodging a rouge cassini and leaps over Tiangong 1.*

That will stop that pesky Solar System!

Waiter! There is a modder in my soup!

He is changing the config files of your soup...

Waiter! There is a Barn-VAB in my soup!

You ordered straw soup.

Waiter, there is an Orbiter Space Flight Simulator in my soup!
